SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

Properties.GroupDescription: Automatically created Security Group for ELB SeleniumTestServiceApplicationLoadBalancer4F7D65A4

Command: PRIVATE=$(curl -s http://169.254.170.2/v2/metadata | jq -r '.Containers[0].Networks[0].IPv4Addresses[0]') ; export REMOTE_HOST="http://$PRIVATE:5555"; export SE_OPTS="-host $PRIVATE -port 5555" ; /opt/bin/entry_point.sh
ContainerDefinitions.Name: selenium-chrome-node-container

Command: PRIVATE=$(curl -s http://169.254.170.2/v2/metadata | jq -r '.Containers[0].Networks[0].IPv4Addresses[0]') ; export REMOTE_HOST="http://$PRIVATE:5555"; export SE_OPTS="-host $PRIVATE -port 5555" ; /opt/bin/entry_point.sh
ContainerDefinitions.Name: selenium-firefox-node-container
